  • Method Details

    • getActual

      List<Reading> getActual(User user)
      Parameters:
      user - User that requested to get actual readings
      Returns:
      List of actual readings for user

    • create

      Reading create(User user, Meter type, long reading)
      Parameters:
      user - User submitting new reading
      type - type of meter for submitting reading
      reading - Value of submitting reading
      Returns:
      Reading that has been submitted

    • getForMonth

      List<Reading> getForMonth(User currentUser, LocalDate date)
      Parameters:
      currentUser - User requesting data
      date - Month when readings shall be found
      Returns:
      List of readings submitted in date

    • getAllByUser

      List<Reading> getAllByUser(User currentUser)

      currentUser - User requesting data
      Returns:
      List of all readings for currentUser
